Nightlight:

Nightlight said while she looked at the two males "I need the tools to keep 
safe my family, but I dont know wich ones I need... I never has been a 
warrior..." then she remembered her bitter experience as BlackStorm and with 
a bitter tone said "not as Maximal..."

Elita nodded, she knew that her mom was reprogramed as Pred once, but she 
was much better as Maximal

-----Mensaje original----- 
From: Sandy
Sent: Wednesday, July 27, 2011 8:53 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: MEdic Bay

Nightshift looks over to Nightlight, seeing an opportunity to try his skills 
at teaching the art of the Ninjabot to Nightlight, which would enhance her 
skill level considerably.  It was all about speed, precision, balance, 
discipline, grace, and of course effectiveness.

He could see potential in her and turns his head in both Nightlight and 
Bumps direction.

" Bump's right, that's somethn' ya gotta learn, but I see a lotta potential 
for train'n ya as a Ninjabot.  You got the right moves, mody, and grace, and 
once you're trained, there's gonna be no stopp'n you Nightlight.  Master 
Yokitron once said, that a student often shows potential even if they don't 
realize it themselves.  Now, that's totally up to you if ya want the 
training, just see me after we get repaired, and I'll set up a training 
program for ya.  Hmm, maybe Rodimus might wanna join in on it too..  It's a 
perfect opportunity for both of you ta get some extra training under your 
belts."

He positions himself again.

" It would really help both of you out a lot, see'n what Hydras managed ta 
pull on ya in the past.  The reason why it didn't work on Tucson or me, is 
that Master Yokitron's training sorta prepared us spiritually for what could 
come down the pike.  Clear minds empty of thoughts are less likely ta get 
infected by negative influences, simply because there's no thought energy ta 
hold onto.  Clear mind, clear soul, clear spark.  Bad stuff just goes in one 
way, and out the other.  You guys had a lot on your minds when Hydras took 
you.  And that couldn't be helped, but now it can be.  I bet my spark plugs 
that if you and Rodimus train with me, I can get both of ya up ta our level 
and that'll make you a pair of the strongest Autobots this side of the 
galaxy, but not the type of strength most warriors perceive.  This type of 
strength is the strength of spirit, inner peace, and harmony.  A perfect 
balance between spark, soul, and mind.  And yeah, there's a lotta dexterity 
aquired in Ninjabot training, the type of dexterity that makes even Tucson 
Prime a bit different then the traditional Autobot Commander.  It's a 
difference Hydras has no inclination how ta fend off. THAT'S the direction 
Tucson is gonna take, and if you guys were trained in our art, so more power 
to ya."

He then looks to Bump, as the repair bench does its job to repair the 
internal damages done to him.

" Speakn' of performance, that reminds me...  I need new hydraulic shock 
absorbers, timing belt, and I know my struts need work, new tires, body 
work, and Ty Rods fixed.  Oh yeah, need a new front and back end alignment 
too."

To repair the damgages to his alt form, he now transforms into his vehicle 
mode, to prepare for the rest of his repairs.  He also notices a busted 
headlight on the left side.

"Scrap, throw in a new headlight for the left side, new bumpers, front, 
back, side, and awww slag, transmission's actn' up.  Probably because I 
smacked that tree real hard in alt form. After this is all done, I am so 
gonna give those preds the bill, literally.  In other words, I need a total 
overhaul ta my alt form.  And if you can help it, I'd like ta hold onta this 
one for a while."
